parts.name: Helicopter Deck
parts.info: 72.8 ft / 22.2 m Weight capacity of 13.2 t / 12 MT in accordance with ABS rules and CAP 437

parts.name: Main Crane
parts.info: NOV Active Heave Compensated (AHC) crane => 275.5 t with 13,000 ft / 250 MT with 4000 m working capacity '\n' Auxiliary hoist => 22.1 t with 8,202.1 ft / 20 MT with 2500 m working capacity (man-rated)

parts.name: Utility Crane
parts.info: 1 x auxiliary crane => 44.1 t / 40 MT single parted '\n' 1x  provisioning crane => 1.7 t / 1.5 MT '\n'
